籤詩版本二:
E hele pololei i ka Pohaku Immortal no ke aʻo ʻana i ke ola ʻole.
Alohilohi mau ka lani uliuli, ka lā a me ka mahina, a laha ka inoa o ka puʻuwai pono a puni ka honua.
詩意:
He hōʻailona kēia hexagram no ka loaʻa ʻana o ke alakaʻi mai nā poʻe hanohano.
Hele maikaʻi nā mea a pau.
解曰: He hoʻomaka a he hopena. Mai hele i ke komohana a i ka hikina. E hoʻohana i kou puʻuwai. Nui ka poe hanohano.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua haʻalele ʻo Liu Zhiyuan i ka pūʻali koa
ʻO Liu Zhiyuan (Zhiyuan) no Shatao (ʻohana Shatuo).
Noho ʻo Liu Zhiyuan a me kāna wahine ʻo Li Sanniang i ka hale o kona ʻanakala, ua manaʻo kona ʻanakala he ʻilihune ʻo Liu Zhiyuan (Zhiyuan), no laila, koi ʻo ia iā Zhiyuan e hele i ka māla melon, me ka manaʻo e ʻai ʻia ʻo Liu e nā ʻuhane melon ʻelua. he pu i ka po, kaua i ka melon, hele ilalo, a eli i ka lepo, e kii i ka pahikaua a me ka buke kaua.
Lalau ae la oia i kana pahikaua a me kona akamai kaua, aloha aku la i kana wahine, a komo aku la i ka puali, a holo pu aku me Yue Xun a noho luna no ka elele hooluolu.
Ua luku aku ka Khitan i ka moʻokūʻauhau Jin, a waiho i ka Central Plains me ka haku ʻole, ua lilo ʻo Zhiyuan i mōʻī ma Jinyang.
Ua hoʻololi ʻia ka ʻāina i ka Later Han Dynasty. Ua kapa ʻia ʻo Tianfu (inoa makahiki) me ka hoʻololi ʻole i ke au.
聖意: Ua palekana ka home, ua maikaʻi ke kanaka, ua maikaʻi ke kālā, ua maikaʻi ka ʻoihana, ua maikaʻi ka male ʻana, ua male ka kāne, ua hoʻi ka huakaʻi kāne i ke kula, ua ʻohi ʻia ka hapalua o nā enuhe silika, ua kūleʻa nā holoholona ʻeono. , Loaʻa ke kanaka, lanakila ka hoʻopiʻi, maikaʻi ka neʻe ʻana, maikaʻi ka waiwai nalowale, ʻo Anshan ka maʻi, maikaʻi ka lua kupapaʻu.
古人: Ua haʻalele ʻo Liu Zhiyuan i ka pūʻali koa
